annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink,I make the 20th Century Limited Cocktail, a drink from North By Northwest, an absolute classic film from the 50's, and my per...
annotations.title: The 20th Century Cocktail | How to Drink

annotations.description: This cocktail is attributed to Brit William J. Tarling who first published it in the Cafe Royale Cocktail Book in 1937. The drink was named after a rail line...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: 20th Century

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Gin
.75oz (22.5ml) Cocchi Americano
.5oz (15ml) White Creme De Cocao
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
Lemon Twist

Shake over ice and strain into coupe
Garnish with lemon twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t0khdTseFLY

---

.75oz Lemon juice
.5oz Creme de Cacao
.75oz Lillet Blanc
1.5oz London Dry Gin

Shake over ice and pour
Garnish with twist of lemon

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EYdOq-DZBQM&t=486s
title: 20th Century Cocktail
